data.title: Tribute to President Jacques Chirac (1932-2019)
data.meta_description: As part of the national day of mourning declared by the President of the French Republic following the death of President Jacques Chirac last September 26, a minute of silence shall be observed on Monday, September 30 at 3:00 PM at the French offices in the Philippines.
data.meta_site_name: La France aux Philippines et en Micronésie
data.text:
As part of the national day of mourning declared by the President of the French Republic following the death of President Jacques Chirac last September 26, a minute of silence shall be observed on Monday, September 30 at 3:00 PM at the French offices in the Philippines: the Embassy, the Economic Service, the Alliance française de Manille, the Alliance française de Cebu, the French School in Manila, and the French Development Agency.

Book of condolences

Persons who wish to pay tribute to the memory of President CHIRAC by signing the book of condolences are requested to proceed, with an identification card, to the following addresses:

the Embassy of France, until Wednesday, October 2, 2019, from 10:00 AM to 12:30 PM and from 2:00 PM to 5:30 PM (16/F Pacific Star Building, Sen. Gil Puyat Extension cor. Makati Avenue - Makati City, 1200)

or

the French School in Manila, until Tuesday, October 1, 2019 from 7:30 AM to 5:00 PM (75 Swaziland Street, Better Living Subdivision, Parañaque, 1711 Metro Manila).

Those who wish to send an e-mail to be included in the book of condolences may address their messages to ambassade.manille-amba@diplomatie.gouv.fr.
